title: 1 Prison Escapee Killed By Police; Manhunt For 2nd Continues
teaser: Authorities say they have shot and killed escaped convict Richard Matt three weeks after he and another inmate escaped from a prison in northern New York State. The other escapee, David Sweat, is still at large.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
